TopicTitle: A Question for Command Line Users

Articles.Content: Do you ever find yourself pressing tab to autocomplete in situations where it makes no sense? (i.e web addresses, google docs) Recently I have found myself doing way to much. Am I the exception or is this normal for linux users?
It's OK. GUI users kill the flies with a mouse cursor.

It's very normal.

As normal as a KSP player trying to use right-click drag to rotate images.

It's very normal.

As normal as a KSP player trying to use right-click drag to rotate images.

You are a mentalist... I do this every time watching KSP videos on youtube.
